stplanr v0.2.10
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • stplanr: A Package for Transport Planning
  • Changelog

Spatial polygons of home locations for flow analysis.

Source: R/data.r
zones.Rd

These correspond to the cents() data.

Details

  • geo_code. the official code of the zone

Examples

zones
#> class       : SpatialPolygonsDataFrame 
#> features    : 8 
#> extent      : -1.568904, -1.499425, 53.79758, 53.83613  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> crs         : +init=epsg:4326 +proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs +ellps=WGS84 +towgs84=0,0,0 
#> variables   : 4
#> names       :  geo_code, geo_label, geo_labelw,  avslope 
#> min values  : E02002361, Leeds 032,         NA, 2.284782 
#> max values  : E02002393, Leeds 064,         NA, 5.091685 
zones_sf

plot(zones_sf)
